article.title: Longbow to Support Saudi Arabia
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Longbow LLC, Orlando, Fla., is being awarded a $39,026,852 modification, to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price, foreign-military-sales contract, for the procurement of mast mounted assemblies; fire controls radars; and peculiar ground support equipment. The cumulative total face value of this contract is $333,348,252. This contract is in support of Saudi Arabia. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Ala., is the contracting activity.
